text:
Attached some patches that add support for the Neutron protocol under 1.2. 

Files: 
 - sitetree.xmap.diff: adds support for Neutron authentication (embedded and
stand-alone clients)
 - page2xhtml.xsl.diff: enabled Neutron introspection for default publication
 - usecase-neutron.zip: core usecase. Copy to webapps/lenya/usecases
 - usecase-neutron-default.zip. default styling + publication specific
introspection directive. Copy to webapps/lenya/pubs/default/lenya/usecases/neutron
creator: comiotto@rcfmedia.ch
